item.description: Thinking about the nuclear disaster in Japan? JREX and MIT are co-sponsoring a special panel discussion and viewing of "Chernobyl Heart," winner of the 2004 Academy Award for Best Documentary - Short Subject. Tickets are only $5 and the movie will be available in Russian audio with English subtitles and Japanese subtitles. Please check the link below for their English-language flyer. Should be interesting and enlightening, so if you'd like to attend please follow the instructions on the flyer, and if you have questions you can contact them directly. http://ftp.jrex.us/ch...
item.name: CHERNOBYL HEART
